name: LOSS IN THE WEST
description:
You're Sam.  You lost someone dear to you and you're searching the bastards responsible for it. The lead ends on a Hotel in the middle of nowhere, but as soon as you arrive you realise something's not right and it's your call to find out what's going on, and find your loved one.

CONTROLS:
Move: W/A/S/D.
Camera: Mouse.
Shoot: Left Click.
Interact: E

CREDITS:

Luis Caicedo (PROGRAMMING)

Luz Dominguez (MUSIC & SFX/ 3D ITEMS/ UI)
 
Steven Galvan (3D CHARACTERS & SCENERY / ILUSTRATIONS )
